programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Olivia Newton-John (11/12/76)
programme.desc: Olivia Newton-John sings 2 of her numerous chart-topping tunes and fills in Johnny on growing up in Australia.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - Walter Matthau (12/10/81)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau regale Johnny with tales of making 5 movies together and a stunt gone wrong.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Betty White (11/12/81)
programme.desc: Betty White critiques Johnny’s sketch comedy performance and quizzes him on the wonders of nature.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: The Best Of Garry Shandling (5/17/89)
programme.desc: Only on The Tonight Show will you see Patrick Swayze talking about a song he wrote called "Sweet June Farts."

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Tim Allen (1/29/92)
programme.desc: Tim Allen, Melanie Griffith and......the great dog photos by famed photographer William Wegman

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Elia Kazan (8/17/78)
programme.desc: Two-time Oscar-winning director Elia Kazan explains why writing his novel was harder than filmmaking.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Dinah Shore (11/10/77)
programme.desc: Fellow talk show host and chart-topping vocalist Dinah Shore sings 2 of her hits.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Kevin Bacon (1/31/92)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon talks about this new kid and Amanda Plummer talks about her famous parents

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - Joey Bishop (2/24/76)
programme.desc: Brat packer, TV personality Joey Bishop talks career, politics, how he gave up smoking and lost weight.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Garry Shandling (3/18/81)
programme.desc: Gary Shandling delivers huge laughs over laundromats, dinner with his dad and visiting friends with babies.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Animal Antics With Joan Embery (2/20/74)
programme.desc: Animal trainer Joan Embery introduces Johnny to a wide variety of animals.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Jennifer Grey (2/2/90)
programme.desc: Jennifer Grey talks about her famous parents and Carl Reiner talks about his famous friends.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Dabney Coleman (5/2/90)
programme.desc: Vodka and Russia are twin themes on this fun episode with Yakov Smirnoff and Dabney Coleman.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Danny DeVito (3/12/87)
programme.desc: Danny DeVito appears on the couch, as well as Rohan Varavadekar and Calvin Trillin.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Danny Thomas (1/20/76)
programme.desc: Comedian Danny Thomas chats working with fellow funny man Jonathan Winters and his latest show on NBC.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '60s - James Garner (9/13/91)
programme.desc: James talks series, “Man Of The People,” biggest career clinkers, TV Hall Of Fame, and public speaking fear.
